Uses of Class
chess.Piece

Packages that use Piece 
Package Description
chess  
chess.piece  

  • Uses of Piece in chess

    Fields in chess declared as Piece 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    Piece[][] Chess.chessboard
    This is a chessboard of grid size 8 * 8 (regular chessboard).
    Methods in chess that return Piece 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Piece Chess.getPiece​(int row, int col)
    Returns Piece at specified location of the chessboard.
    Piece Piece.promote​(java.lang.String promoType)
    Promotes Piece to Pawn to specified Piece type.
    Methods in chess with parameters of type Piece 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    abstract boolean Piece.canReach​(int er, int ec, Piece[][] chessboard)
    Determines whether a Piece can reach a specific location to kill an enemy if the enemy were to be there.
    static King Piece.findKing​(Piece[][] chessboard, char color)
    Finds the King for the specified color.
    abstract java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer[]> Piece.getAllPossibleMoves​(Piece[][] chessboard, int turn_number)
    Returns all possible moves that a specific piece is capable of making.
    abstract boolean Piece.isValidMove​(int er, int ec, Piece[][] chessboard, int turn_number)
    Checks whether a specific move for a Piece is valid.
    static boolean Piece.leavesKingChecked​(Piece[][] chessboard, char color)
    Checks whether a specific move leaves its own team's king checked.
